name: BarnwellRoboticsClub
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Robotics Club is a year-long extracurricular activity that middle school students from 6th, 7th, and 8th grade must apply for in August. We participate in the First Lego League competition in the fall season, which comprises of 10 students per team with 2 coaches. In the spring, we participate in the General Motors competition, which comprises of 5 students per team with one coach per team. The number of teams available determines on how many parent or grandparent volunteers we have for the year. If you are interested in the club or volunteering for the Robotics club, please contact me for more information at heather.tomicich@fhsdschools.org
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
